workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.4934420337797242 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.48660527966263917 --weight-decay 5.638749894153472e-06 --lr 0.0009268519201335368 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 143755 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.03611756704656719 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
